title: Player layout: enforce 5vw breathing-circle gap from side volume sliders

requirements.summary: Adjust the Player screen so the BreathingCircle never overlaps the left/right VerticalVolumeControl sliders and always keeps at least a 5vw horizontal gap from each slider card while remaining centered and fully visible.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Player page, the breathing circle does not overlap either vertical volume slider card at any time.
The minimum horizontal gap between the breathing circle edge and each slider card is >= 5vw (5% of the viewport width).
The breathing circle remains centered between the two slider controls and remains fully visible within the viewport (no clipping).

file_operations.description: Refactor the main Player content layout from absolute-positioned side controls to a 3-column grid or flex layout that places left slider, circle, and right slider in-flow with a horizontal gap of at least 5vw between columns; ensure the circle stays centered and side controls remain vertically centered without overlap across screen sizes/orientations.

Make the BreathingCircle size responsive to its container (e.g., use full width with a max size and an aspect-square/rounded-full shape) so it can shrink as needed to preserve the >=5vw gap from side slider cards while staying fully visible; ensure the countdown text scales or wraps safely to avoid clipping when the circle shrinks.
